bug.author: TOsmanov
bug.description: When change “Issue Tracking”, text “not specified” remains in the editing field. It would be more convenient if field for editing became empty (if link to issue tracking not specified). <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/54434686/70418398-54d51280-1a74-11ea-8adf-8e2ae6d73ab7.PNG></denchmark-link>
